title: We Put Moe's Improv Rapping Skills To The Test
description:
Everyone knows how improv works, right? In theatre, someone throws out a person, place, or thing, and you have to turn it into an unplanned script.
Since Moe has a history of rapping, we’re putting Moe’s skills to the test. And we didn’t make it easy, either. We're giving him three random words to turn into a freestyle.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
